- [93mUnderstanding[0m the [93minterfacial[0m [93minteraction[0m [93mcharacteristics[0m of [93masphalt[0m [93mnanocomposites[0m [93mreinforced[0m with [93mdiamond[0m [93mnanothreads[0m and [93mcarbon[0m [93mnanotubes[0m.: [93mDiamond[0m [93mnanothreads[0m ([93mDNTs[0m) and [93mcarbon[0m [93mnanotubes[0m ([93mCNTs[0m) [93mhave[0m [93memerged[0m as [93mpromising[0m [93mreinforcement[0m [93mmaterials[0m for [93masphalt[0m. [93mHowever[0m, the [93minterfacial[0m [93mproperties[0m between [93mDNTs[0m/[93mCNTs[0m and [93masphalt[0m [93mremain[0m [93mpoorly[0m [93munderstood[0m, [93mhindering[0m the [93madvancement[0m of [93mDNT[0m-/[93mCNT[0m-[93mmodified[0m [93masphalt[0m [93mnanocomposites[0m. In this [93mstudy[0m, [93mpullout[0m [93mtests[0m were [93mconducted[0m on [93masphalt[0m [93mnanocomposites[0m [93mreinforced[0m with [93mDNTs[0m, [93mnitrogen[0m-[93mdoped[0m [93mdiamond[0m [93mnanothreads[0m ([93mNDNTs[0m), and [93mCNTs[0m, to [93manalyze[0m the [93mpullout[0m [93mperformance[0m and [93mreinforcing[0m [93mmechanisms[0m [93macross[0m [93mvarious[0m [93mtemperature[0m [93mranges[0m. The [93mfindings[0m [93mreveal[0m that [93mCNT[0m-[93mmodified[0m [93masphalt[0m [93mnanocomposites[0m [93mexhibited[0m [93msuperior[0m [93mpullout[0m [93mperformance[0m [93mcompared[0m to those [93mreinforced[0m with [93mDNTs[0m, [93mprimarily[0m [93mdue[0m to [93mπ[0m-[93mπ[0m [93mstacking[0m [93minteractions[0m that [93mfacilitated[0m the [93mwrapping[0m of [93masphalt[0m [93mmolecules[0m [93maround[0m [93mCNT[0m [93msurfaces[0m. Among the [93mDNT[0m [91mvariants[0m, the [93mDNT2[0m-[93mmodified[0m [93masphalt[0m [93mnanocomposite[0m [93mdemonstrated[0m the [93mhighest[0m [93mpullout[0m [93mperformance[0m, which was [93mattributed[0m to its [93mhelical[0m [93mstructure[0m that [93menhanced[0m [93mmechanical[0m [93minterlocking[0m within the [93masphalt[0m [93mmatrix[0m. [93mNotably[0m, [93mNDNTs[0m [93mshowed[0m the [93mhighest[0m [93mbinding[0m [93menergy[0m [93mrelative[0m to [93mDNTs[0m and [93mCNTs[0m, [93mstemming[0m from [93minteractions[0m between [93mhydroxyl[0m [93mgroups[0m on [93masphaltene[0m-[93mphenol[0m and [93mnitrogen[0m [93matoms[0m on [93mNDNTs[0m, [93mleading[0m to the [93mformation[0m of [93mO[0m-[93mH[0m⋯[93mN[0m [93mhydrogen[0m [93mbonds[0m. [93mDensity[0m [93mfunctional[0m [93mtheory[0m ([93mDFT[0m) [93mcalculations[0m [93mindicated[0m that [93mnitrogen[0m [93mdoping[0m [93mmodified[0m the [93melectronic[0m [93mstructure[0m of [93mNDNTs[0m, [93mresulting[0m in [93mlocalized[0m [93mnegative[0m [93mcharges[0m that [93menhance[0m [93mtheir[0m [93moverall[0m [93melectronegativity[0m.
- How the [93mhyperconjugation[0m [93minteraction[0m [93maffects[0m [93mintrinsic[0m [93mreactivity[0m in an [93mS[0m([93mN[0m)[93m2[0m [93mreaction[0m.: [93mHyperconjugative[0m [93minteractions[0m are [93mwidely[0m [93mrecognized[0m as [93mstabilizing[0m [93melectronic[0m [93meffects[0m in [93mmolecular[0m [92msystems[0m. In this [93mwork[0m, [93mwe[0m [93maddress[0m a [93mfundamental[0m [93mquestion[0m: [93mcan[0m [93mhyperconjugation[0m [93mdirectly[0m [93mshape[0m the [93mintrinsic[0m [93mbarrier[0m in an [93masymmetric[0m [93mS[0m [93mN[0m [93m2[0m [93mreaction[0m? It is [93mworth[0m [93mnoting[0m that [93menergy[0m [93mdifferences[0m were [93malso[0m [93mevaluated[0m [93musing[0m the [93mCCSD[0m([93mT[0m)-[93mSMD[0m([93mTHF[0m) [93mmethod[0m. [93mIntrinsic[0m [93mbarriers[0m were [93mextracted[0m from the [93mtheoretical[0m [93mactivation[0m [93mbarrier[0m [93musing[0m [93mMarcus[0m' [93mtheory[0m to [93misolate[0m the [93mrequired[0m [93menergy[0m for the [93mnuclear[0m [93mreorganization[0m [93mfree[0m from [93mthermodynamic[0m [93mbias[0m. The [93mdonor[0m-[93macceptor[0m [93minteractions[0m were [93mquantified[0m through [93mnatural[0m [93mbond[0m [93morbital[0m ([93mNBO[0m) [93manalysis[0m; [93mmoreover[0m, [93mquantum[0m [93mtheory[0m of [93matoms[0m in [93mmolecules[0m ([93mQTAIM[0m) [93mdescriptors[0m [93mprovided[0m a [93mcomplementary[0m, [93morbital[0m-[93mindependent[0m [93mperspective[0m. In the [93mstudied[0m [92msystems[0m, a [93mstrong[0m [93mcorrelation[0m between the [93mstabilization[0m [93menergies[0m and the [93mintrinsic[0m [93mactivation[0m [93mbarriers[0m was [93mobserved[0m, [93mone[0m that is not [93mevident[0m when [93mconsidering[0m [93mapparent[0m [93mbarriers[0m. This [93mdistinction[0m [93munderscores[0m, within the [93mpresent[0m [92mframework[0m, the [93mimportance[0m of [93misolating[0m [93mintrinsic[0m [93mcontributions[0m when [93mevaluating[0m [93mfundamental[0m [93mreactivity[0m [93mtrends[0m. [93mQTAIM[0m [93mdescriptors[0m, [93msuch[0m as the [93melectron[0m [93mdensity[0m at the [93mbond[0m [93mcritical[0m [93mpoint[0m ( [93mρ[0m [93mBCP[0m ) and the | [93mV[0m [93mBCP[0m |/ [93mG[0m [93mBCP[0m [93mratio[0m, [93mcaptured[0m [93maspects[0m of the [93mlocal[0m [93melectronic[0m [93menvironment[0m, [93mparticularly[0m [93melectronegativity[0m and [93mpolarizability[0m, that were [93mconsistent[0m with the [93mintrinsic[0m [93mreactivity[0m [93mobserved[0m [93macross[0m the [93mspecific[0m [93mnucleophile[0m [93mfamilies[0m [93mexamined[0m. In [92msystems[0m [93mbearing[0m [93mα[0m-[93msubstituents[0m, the [93mpresence[0m of [93msecondary[0m [93mstabilizing[0m [93minteractions[0m, [93mlikely[0m [93minvolving[0m [93mnon[0m-[93mcovalent[0m [93mcontacts[0m between the [93mnucleophile[0m and [93mC[0m-[93mH[0m [93mbonds[0m of the [93melectrophile[0m, [93mmay[0m [93mcontribute[0m to [93mlowering[0m the [93mintrinsic[0m [93mbarrier[0m. [93mTogether[0m, these [93mfindings[0m [93mdemonstrate[0m that [93mboth[0m [93mNBO[0m and [93mQTAIM[0m [93manalyses[0m are [93mrobust[0m [92mtools[0m to [93mdetermine[0m the [93melectronic[0m [93mcontributions[0m that [33mgovern[0m [93mreactivity[0m and [93mselectivity[0m in the [93manalyzed[0m [93mS[0m [93mN[0m [93m2[0m [93mreactions[0m. [93mFurthermore[0m, [93mthey[0m [93mposition[0m [93mhyperconjugation[0m not [93mmerely[0m as a [93mpassive[0m [93mstabilizing[0m [93meffect[0m but [93malso[0m as an [93mactive[0m [93mmodulator[0m [93mcapable[0m of [93mtuning[0m [93mintrinsic[0m [93mreactivity[0m in [93morganic[0m [93mreactions[0m.
- [93mNew[0m [93msensors[0m [93mbased[0m on [93mDNA[0m [93mbase[0m [93mpairs[0m: [93mDFT[0m, [93mQTAIM[0m, and [93mNCI[0m-[93mRDG[0m [93mstudy[0m.: [93mContext[0m: [93mToxic[0m [93magents[0m in the [93menvironment[0m [93mrepresent[0m a [93mserious[0m [93mthreat[0m to [93mhuman[0m [93mlife[0m and [93mpose[0m a [93mmajor[0m [93mproblem[0m, which [93mhas[0m [93mled[0m [93mscientists[0m to [93mconduct[0m [93mcontinuous[0m [93mresearch[0m into [93mmethods[0m for [93mdetecting[0m and [93mremoving[0m [93mthem[0m from the [93menvironment[0m. For [93mexample[0m, [93mH₂S[0m, [93mSO₂[0m, [93mNH₃[0m, [93mCO[0m, [93mCO₂[0m, NO, and [93mNO₂[0m are [93mtoxic[0m [93magents[0m [93mcommonly[0m [93mfound[0m in [93mtheir[0m [93mgaseous[0m [93mstate[0m. [93mEnhancing[0m [93menvironmental[0m [93msensing[0m is, [93mtherefore[0m, [93messential[0m for [93mprotecting[0m the [93mecosystem[0m. In this [93mcontext[0m, [93mwe[0m [93msuggest[0m [93mnew[0m [93mcomplexes[0m of [93mcopper[0m and [93mcobalt[0m [93mbased[0m on [93mthymine[0m [93mbase[0m [93mpair[0m: [[93mthym[0m-[93mCo[0m-[93mthym[0m] and [[93mthym[0m-[93mCu[0m-[93mthym[0m] as [93msensors[0m to [93mdetect[0m and to [93mattract[0m [93mtoxic[0m [93magents[0m. [93mOur[0m [93mtheoretical[0m [93mstudy[0m [93mdemonstrates[0m the [93mpotential[0m of the [93mproposed[0m [93mcomplexes[0m to [93mact[0m as [93mbiosensors[0m [93mcapable[0m of [93mcapturing[0m [93mtoxic[0m [93magents[0m from the [93menvironment[0m, as [93msupported[0m by [93mvarious[0m [93mquantum[0m [93mchemistry[0m [93mmethods[0m, [93mincluding[0m [93mquantum[0m [93mtheory[0m of [93matoms[0m in [93mmolecules[0m ([93mQTAIM[0m), [93mreduced[0m [93mdensity[0m [93mgradient[0m ([93mRDG[0m), [93mnatural[0m [93mbond[0m [93morbitals[0m ([93mNBO[0m), and [93mnon[0m-[93mcovalent[0m [93minteraction[0m ([93mNCI[0m) [93manalysis[0m. [93mOrbital[0m [93minteraction[0m is [93mfavored[0m for [93mH[0m [93m2[0m [93mS[0m ([93m0[0m.[93m06[0m [93meV[0m, [93m0[0m.[93m04[0m [93meV[0m) and NO ([93m0[0m.[93m24[0m [93meV[0m, [93m0[0m.[93m35[0m [93meV[0m) for [93mboth[0m [93mcomplexes[0m [[93mthym[0m-[93mCo[0m-[93mthym[0m] and [[93mthym[0m-[93mCu[0m-[93mthym[0m] [93mrespectively[0m. [93mEnergetically[0m, [93minteraction[0m of [[93mthym[0m-[93mCo[0m-[93mthym[0m] and [[93mthym[0m-[93mCu[0m-[93mthym[0m] is [93mmore[0m [93mfavorable[0m with SO [93m2[0m (- [93m319[0m.[93m9[0m [93mkcal[0m/[93mmol[0m, - [93m332[0m.[93m5[0m [93mkcal[0m/[93mmol[0m [93mrespectively[0m) than with the [93mother[0m [93magents[0m. [93mAccording[0m to the [93mRDG[0m ([93mreduced[0m [93mdensity[0m [93mgradient[0m) [93mmethod[0m, the [93mvalues[0m of ([93msignλ2[0m) [93mρ[0m([93mr[0m) where [93mλ2[0m is the [93msecond[0m [93meigenvalue[0m of the [93melectron[0m [93mdensity[0m [93mHessian[0m [93mmatrix[0m, are [93mnegative[0m with [93mρ[0m([93mr[0m) > [93m0[0m. This [93mindicates[0m [93mstrong[0m [93mattractive[0m [93mnon[0m-[93mcovalent[0m [93minteractions[0m [93msuch[0m as [93mhydrogen[0m [93mbonding[0m and [93mhalogen[0m [93mbonding[0m between the [93mcomplexes[0m and the [93mtoxic[0m [93magents[0m, [93mcase[0m of [93mHCN[0m with [93mthym[0m-[93mCu[0m-[93mthym[0m and NO with [93mthym[0m-[93mCo[0m-[93mthym[0m. [93mMost[0m of the [93mother[0m [93minteractions[0m between the [93mcomplexes[0m and the [93mtoxic[0m [93magents[0m are of the [93mvan[0m [93mder[0m [93mWaals[0m [93mtype[0m, as ([93msign[0m [93mλ2[0m) [93mρ[0m([93mr[0m)≈[93m0[0m. The [93mquantum[0m [93mtheory[0m of [93matoms[0m in [93mmolecules[0m ([93mQTAIM[0m) [93mconfirms[0m the [93minteractions[0m between the [93mproposed[0m [93mcomplexes[0m and the [93mtoxic[0m [93magents[0m through the [93mappearance[0m of [93mbond[0m [93mcritical[0m [93mpoints[0m ([93mBCPs[0m). The [93mtopological[0m [93manalysis[0m of the [93mLaplacian[0m of the [93melectron[0m [93mdensity[0m ∇ [93m2[0m [93mρ[0m([93mr[0m), the [93melectron[0m [93mdensity[0m [93mρ[0m([93mr[0m), and the [93mtotal[0m [93melectronic[0m [93menergy[0m [93mdensity[0m [93mH[0m([93mr[0m) at these [93mBCPs[0m [93mindicates[0m that the [93minteractions[0m between the [93mcomplexes[0m and the [93mtoxic[0m [93magents[0m are [93mpredominantly[0m [93mclassified[0m as [93mpure[0m [93mclosed[0m-[93mshell[0m [93minteractions[0m, [93mexcept[0m in the [93mcase[0m of NO and [93mNO₂[0m, which [93mexhibit[0m [93mpartial[0m [93mcovalent[0m [93mcharacter[0m with [93mboth[0m [93mcobalt[0m and [93mcopper[0m [93mcomplexes[0m. [93mQuantum[0m [93mtheory[0m of [93matoms[0m in [93mmolecules[0m is in [93maccord[0m with [93mreduced[0m [93mdensity[0m [93mgradient[0m ([93mRDG[0m) in [93mdescription[0m of [93mnon[0m-[93mcovalent[0m [93minteractions[0m. [93mAll[0m these [93mfactors[0m [93mcould[0m [93msupport[0m the [93menvironmentally[0m [93msustainable[0m [93msynthesis[0m of these [93mmolecules[0m as [93mbiosensors[0m. [93mInteraction[0m of the [93mtwo[0m [93mcomplexes[0m with [93madducts[0m [93mincreases[0m the [93mhardness[0m ([93mη[0m) [93mvalues[0m. [93mSoftness[0m [93mdecreases[0m after [93minteraction[0m with [93madducts[0m. The [93melectronegativity[0m ([93mχ[0m) and [93melectrophilicity[0m ([93mω[0m) are [93mdecreased[0m after [93minteracting[0m with [93madducts[0m, so that the [93mability[0m to [93mcapture[0m [93mone[0m or [93mmore[0m [93melectrons[0m [93mwill[0m be [93mreduced[0m. [93mMost[0m of [93mdonor[0m-[93macceptor[0m [93morbitals[0m [93mfortify[0m the [93minteraction[0m of [93mdifferent[0m [93madducts[0m with [93mboth[0m of [[93mthym[0m-[93mCo[0m-[93mthym[0m] and [[93mthym[0m-[93mCu[0m-[93mthym[0m] [93mcomplexes[0m. [[93mthym[0m-[93mCo[0m-[93mthym[0m] [93mcomplex[0m [93mexhibits[0m [93mbest[0m [93mdetection[0m of NO [93m2[0m and NO by a [93mbroad[0m [93mrise[0m at [93m400[0m-[93m500[0m [93mnm[0m and of SO [93m2[0m through an [93mintensity[0m [93mjump[0m [93mblue[0m-[93mshift[0m in the [93mUV[0m, while [[93mthym[0m-[93mCu[0m-[93mthym[0m] [93mcomplex[0m [93mdetects[0m [93mH[0m [93m2[0m [93mS[0m and [93mHCN[0m by [93mstrong[0m [93mband[0m at [93malmost[0m [93m470[0m-[93m500[0m [93mnm[0m. [93mCO[0m [93m2[0m is [93mweakly[0m [93minteracting[0m in [93mboth[0m [93mcomplexes[0m. At [93m200[0m-[93m400[0m [93mnm[0m [93mregion[0m [[93mthym[0m-[93mCo[0m-[93mthym[0m] [93mshows[0m [93mwell[0m [93mdetection[0m of SO [93m2[0m , [93mH[0m [93m2[0m [93mS[0m, [93mCO[0m [93m2[0m , [93mCO[0m, and [93mHCN[0m, [93mwhereas[0m [[93mthym[0m-[93mCu[0m-[93mthym[0m] [93mindicates[0m [93mwell[0m [93mdetection[0m of NO, [93mCO[0m, [93mCO[0m [93m2[0m , [93mH[0m [93m2[0m [93mS[0m, and SO [93m2[0m . [93mMethods[0m: [93mStudied[0m [93mstructures[0m are [93moptimized[0m at [93mDFT[0m/[93mM06[0m-[93m2x[0m/[93m6[0m-[93m311[0m + [93mG[0m([93md[0m,[93mp[0m) [93mlevel[0m of [93mtheory[0m [93mimplemented[0m in [93mGaussian16[0m. The [93mpseudopotential[0m [93mLanL2DZ[0m is [93mused[0m for [93mmetals[0m [93mcopper[0m and [93mcobalt[0m. The [93mreduced[0m [93mdensity[0m [93mgradient[0m ([93mRDG[0m) [93mmethod[0m was [93mapplied[0m, and the [93mfunction[0m [93msign[0m([93mλ₂[0m)[93mρ[0m([93mr[0m) was [93mrequested[0m to [93midentify[0m the [93mtype[0m of [93mnon[0m-[93mcovalent[0m [93minteraction[0m between the [93mcomplexes[0m and the [93madducts[0m ([93mtoxic[0m [93magents[0m). [93mRDG[0m [93mscatter[0m [93mplots[0m are [93mdrawn[0m by [93mmultiwfn[0m [93mprogram[0m and [93mcolored[0m [93musing[0m [93mgnuplot[0m for [93mimproved[0m [93mvisualization[0m. [93mFurthermore[0m, the [93mquantum[0m [93mtheory[0m of [93matoms[0m in [93mmolecules[0m ([93mQTAIM[0m) [93manalysis[0m [93mconfirmed[0m the [93mnon[0m-[93mcovalent[0m [93minteractions[0m between [93mcomplexes[0m and [93madducts[0m ([93mtoxic[0m [93magents[0m). [93mUV[0m-[93mVis[0m [93mabsorption[0m [93mspectra[0m of the [93mall[0m [93mstudied[0m [93mcomplexes[0m were [93mobtained[0m by [93mTD[0m-[93mDFT[0m at the [93msame[0m [93mlevel[0m of [93mtheory[0m [93mTD[0m-[93mSCF[0m/ [93mM602x[0m/[93m6[0m-[93m311G[0m** [93mlevel[0m of [93mtheory[0m.
- [93mLearning[0m with [93mLeaflet[0m of [93mElectronegativity[0m ([93mLoEN[0m): [93mEnhancing[0m [93mStudents[0m' [93mUnderstanding[0m on [93mElectronegativity[0m, [93mChemical[0m [93mBonding[0m, and [93mPolarity[0m: [93mPrevious[0m [93mresearch[0m [93mhas[0m [93mreported[0m that [93mmany[0m [93mhigh[0m-[93mschool[0m and [93mundergraduate[0m [93mstudents[0m [93mhave[0m [93mdifficulty[0m [93mexplaining[0m the [93mrelationship[0m between [93mpolarity[0m and [93melectronegativity[0m even [93mthough[0m [93mthey[0m [93mmay[0m be [93mfamiliar[0m with the [93mconcept[0m of [93mpolarity[0m. This [93mstudy[0m [93maims[0m to [93maddress[0m these [93mmisconceptions[0m [93musing[0m a [93mleaflet[0m and [93massess[0m its [93meffectiveness[0m [93musing[0m [93mquestionnaires[0m and [93mconcept[0m [93mtesting[0m.[93mÂ[0m  A [93msimple[0m, [93mcolorful[0m [93mprintable[0m [93mleaflet[0m was [93mproduced[0m and [93mdistributed[0m to [93mstudents[0m in [93mIndonesia[0m. The [93mLeaflet[0m on [93mElectronegativity[0m ([93mLoEN[0m) [93mprovided[0m [93mstudents[0m with an [93moverview[0m of the [93mtheoretical[0m [93mbasis[0m of the [93mconcepts[0m and [93mguidance[0m on [93mapplying[0m these [93mprinciples[0m. The [93mleaflet[0m [93mformat[0m is [93mcheap[0m and [93measy[0m to [93mmass[0m-[93mproduce[0m, which is an [93mimportant[0m [93mfactor[0m [93mgiven[0m the [93mlimited[0m [93maccess[0m to [93mother[0m [93mtypes[0m of [93mappropriate[0m [93mlearning[0m [93mresources[0m in [93mIndonesia[0m. The [93mleaflet[0m [93mformed[0m the [93mbasis[0m of a [93mclassroom[0m [93mdiscussion[0m [93mactivity[0m. [93mVisualization[0m is [93mknown[0m to [93mplay[0m an [93mimportant[0m [93mrole[0m in [92mconstructing[0m [93mstudents[0m' [93mconceptual[0m [93munderstanding[0m, so the [93mleaflet[0m [93mmade[0m [93mextensive[0m [93muse[0m of [93mdiagrams[0m to [93mexplain[0m [93mrelevant[0m [93mconcepts[0m. The [93mleaflet[0m was [93mprinted[0m in [93mfull[0m [93mcolor[0m to [93mmake[0m it [93mvisually[0m [93mappealing[0m and [93mfacilitate[0m [93mstudent[0m [93mlearning[0m. [93mStudents[0m were [93mtested[0m before and after [93mlearning[0m with the [93mLoEN[0m. A [93mPaired[0m-[93msample[0m [93mt[0m-[93mtest[0m [93musing[0m [93mSPSS[0m is [93mused[0m to [93mcompare[0m the [93mpretest[0m and [93mposttest[0m [93mscores[0m to [93mmeasure[0m the [93meffectivity[0m of the [93mLoEN[0m.A [93mstatistically[0m [93msignificant[0m [93mimprovement[0m in [93mscores[0m ([93mp[0m = [93m0[0m.[93m000[0m) was [93machieved[0m, which [93mindicates[0m that [93musing[0m the [93mLoEN[0m in the [93mclassroom[0m [93mhelps[0m [93mstudents[0m [93munderstand[0m the [93mtopic[0m. [93mAlso[0m, [93mstudents[0m' [93mpositive[0m [93mresponses[0m [93msignify[0m that the [93mLoEN[0m [93mprovides[0m an [93mengaging[0m [93mway[0m to [93mlearn[0m the [93mconcepts[0m.
- [93mImportance[0m of [93mintermolecular[0m -[93mC[0m[93mC[0m-[93mH[0m⋯[93mX[0m-[93mC[0m ([93mX[0m = [93mF[0m, [93mO[0m, [93mN[0m) and -[93mY[0m-[93mH[0m⋯[93mF[0m-[93mC[0m ([93mY[0m = [93mO[0m, [93mN[0m) [93mhydrogen[0m [93mbonds[0m in [93mcrystal[0m [93mstructures[0m.: [93mWeak[0m [93mhydrogen[0m [93mbonds[0m [93minvolving[0m [93morganic[0m [93mfluorine[0m [93mhave[0m been [93mwell[0m [93mdemonstrated[0m through [93mstructural[0m, [93mcomputational[0m, and [93mexperimental[0m [93mcharge[0m [93mdensity[0m [93manalyses[0m in [93mour[0m [93mprevious[0m [93mstudies[0m.
